name: Light Traveler
description: While you have 5 or fewer Inventory Slots filled, your Speed increases by 1 and you add 1 to Dexterity Checks and Saves.

name: Extreme Luck
description: For Attack Checks, you now land a Critical Hit on a 19 or 20, but you land a Critical Failure on a 1 or 2.

name: Severe Quirk
requirements: A quirk that adds and subtracts a d4
description: Choose a Quirk that adds and subtracts a d4. You now roll a d6 for those rolls instead.
